name: Wild Beasts (Esosek)
description:
Wild Beasts is a puzzle card game with a cute low poly visual art style. Summon up to 42 animals with unique abilities in the best possible sequence to beat biomes power. Turn-based summoning system requires thinking ahead to gain as much power as you can in a limited number of turns.
